overview: The story of Gandhinagaril Unniyarcha is based in a village called Gandhinagar where Unniyarcha and her thugs run chit fund and gambling dens. All goes well for Unniyarcha until Kottayam Naseer takes charge of the Gandhinagar Police station and nabs her in a case. What happens next, forms the crux.
title: Gandhinagaril Unniyarcha
